text: The snow goose (Anser caerulescens) is a North American species of goose. Snow Goose or The Snow Goose may also refer to: * The Snow Goose: A Story of Dunkirk, a novella by Paul Gallico * The Snow Goose (film), a 1971 film based on the novella by Paul Gallico * The Snow Goose (album), an album by the band Camel
title: Snow goose (disambiguation)
